reuters.title: BRAZILIAN SOY RAINFALL
reuters.body: THE FOLLOWING RAINFALL WAS RECORDED IN THE 24 HOURS UP TO (1200) GMT TODAY PARANA STATE: CASCAVEL NIL, PONTA GROSSA NIL,CAMPO MOURAO NIL, LONDRINA NIL, MARINGA NIL. RIO GRANDO DO SUL STATE: PASSO FUNDO NIL, SANTA MARIA 7.0 MILLIMETRES, CRUZ ALTA 8.5 MM, SAO LUIZ GONZAGA 4.4 MM. REUTER 
